title: 因為呢場運動，早訓唔返... Can't sleep early after this movement...

replies.msg:
有無巴打絲打好似我咁。。。
暑假果陣掛住睇直播或者心情沉重到訓唔到
日日去到深夜甚至朝早都訓唔著

而加開學都早訓唔返。。。
我以前好準時，而加開左學1個禮拜已經遲到左2日，準備爛GPA...


Does any brother or sister like me that...
Having difficulties in sleeping in summer holiday due to focusing on the live news or bad mood
Can't sleep until midnight or even to the morning

Now I can't fall asleep even the schooling has started
I was very punctual, but now I have already be late for 2 days after the first week.
Going to have a terrible GPA...
